channel.title: Posts on raptor's chinglish blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on raptor's chinglish blog

item.title: Hello world
item.description: This is my first English blog. Sorry for my Chinglish. I will talk some technology about my programming work. perhaps others. I am too lazy to create a better blog, like use Jekyll or others. The README.md is good enough for me. That is all. Updated: 2014-10-17 I am sorry that the README.md seems not good enough. So I use Jekyll now, but ruby is not good, I don’t like it.

item.title: FreeBSD with ZFS installation on Vultr VPS
item.description: (This article is part of the Chinese version 在Vultr的VPS上安装支持ZFS的FreeBSD及SMTP问题的解决) Vultr VPS is good cause thier VPS can be installed FreeBSD. The better thing is it can be installed OS from custom ISO. I had tried the official FreeBSD 10/x64 image, but there is not ZFS. It had been fail when I tried to resize partition to create a ZPOOL. Fortunately,however, we can also install a FreeBSD from custom ISO.
